name: Uprooted (thepinnacle317, ptewie, MikBug, ThentrixX, Eggbotnic, Jazz Boy, draconicelestial, Yabbalabba, Collide01)
name_original: Uprooted (thepinnacle317, ptewie, MikBug, ThentrixX, Eggbotnic, Jazz Boy, draconicelestial, Yabbalabba, Collide01)
description:
Play as a tree traveling diverse landscapes, using puddles to regenerate health and shooting pods to create platforms. 

This game was made for the 2023 Global Game Jam,  theme: roots!

// CONTROLS //

WASD: Movement 

Spacebar: Jump + Double Jump

Left Mouse Button: Fire Thorn

Right Mouse Button: Burrow Roots

Left Shift: Sprint

// CREDITS //
